title: Banana chocolate muffins
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt', '100g plain yoghurt', '100ml vegetable oil', '100g brown sugar', '1 packet vanilla sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 1/2 over-ripe bananas, mashed with a fork', '100g chocolate chips']
